scripts.build: cd src/scss && sass bootstrap.scss ../../dist/css/bootstrap.css && sass fontawesome.scss ../../dist/css/fontawesome.css && sass --watch custom.scss ../../dist/css/custom.css
scripts.serve: cd src/scss && sass bootstrap.scss ../../dist/css/bootstrap.css && sass fontawesome.scss ../../dist/css/fontawesome.css && sass custom.scss ../../dist/css/custom.css
